name: Waterproof Shower Curtain Liner 8G EVA Thick Shower Curtain with Heavy Duty 3 Bottom Magnets, Shower Liner for Shower Stall, Bathtubs, 3D Pebble Pattern, 72 x 72,12 Hooks
short_description: 100% Eva HEAVY DUTY -The shower curtain is extremely thick, sturdy and strong and it does not fly in or move with air flow, also won’t stick to you when showering. It has 3 magnets on the bottom to keep the liner in place and absolutely no water gets out onto the floor. PREMIUM QUALITY - Shower liner is made of EVA material, it will let you and your family have a dry bathroom environment . Waterproof keep the liner clean and fresh for a comfortable shower and tub environment, no need to worry about any moisture. STURDY & DURABLE - The thick shower liner eyelets will never tear because around reinforced and rust proof metal grommet add an additional double layer of protection and ensure long term use.It is 0.2mm sturdy enough than usual liner which is 0.1mm or 0.15mm.It can be used as curtain alone or liner. 3D ATTRACTIVE DESIGN - Very modern and classy clear with pearl white 3D pebble design that allow enough light to come through and let you have privacy .72x72 inch fits most standard size bathtub or shower tall and suitable for straight or curved shower liner rods. APPLICABLE IN MANY PLACES - The shower curtain liner is ideal for campers, home, apartments, schools showers, hotels, dorms, athletic club showers and many more. It is easy to clean and maintain with damp cloth. If the liner has any stretch or rip, just contact us for a refund or replacement without any excuse.
product_description: Heavy Weight EVA Shower Curtain Liner 8G/0.2mm, Waterproof Bathroom Curtain for Bathtub or Shower Stall The shower curtain liner is best choice for you and your family, also safe to your little baby. keep your family a clean and dry shower and tub environment.The liner measures 72” by 72” is 8-gauge/0.2mm thick, so it doesn't billow out and let cold air in or water out. It's well made and sturdy, and highly unlikely to tear; it certainly won't bunch up. Made of Premium Quality Material ---EVA EVA is one of the best and most high-grade new materials. Our bathroom liner is made of EVA. Water droplets will slip off the shower curtain easily. Weight Hem The magnets at the bottom of the liner are weighty enough to keep the liner from billowing. Thick , strong and it doesn't blow up on you and touch you while showering. Protect Your Privacy Use as a Stand-Alone curtain or as a liner, it is not totally clear allow enough light filter through the curtain to see in or out. Easy to Install Installation was quick and easy with 12 shower rings, not include a shower curtain rod. More Details: ♥Keeps water from splashing out ♥Reinforced grommet header won’t let the liner tear easily. ♥Easily fits any standard size shower/tub ♥Easy to clean and maintain Package Include: 1 x shower curtain liner(72 x 72 inch) 12 x shower rings

name: Fabric Shower Curtain Liner, Waterproof Hotel Quality, Bathroom Curtains Rust Resistant Grommets, 72 x 72 Machine Washable (Black)
short_description: Premium Material: Black Shower curtains are made of fabric 100%, the color won't fade. Applicable to hotel and home décor, looks very clean and classy. Bottom Weight: Use the bottom counterweight to keep your shower curtain drapey and prevent it from being blown up during the bath. Easy to Install: Shower curtain have 12 metal grommets which fit most curtain hooks, easy to install and remove. 304 stainless steel grommets can be used for a long time without rusting. Anti-rust Metal Grommets: 12 metal grommets are made of 304 stainless steel grommets, which can be used for a long time without rusting. Easy to Maintain: The Shower liner can machine washable, clean to reuse, fast drying.

name: BTTN Fabric Shower Curtain, Linen Textured Heavy Duty Polyester Cloth Shower Curtain Set with 12 Plastic Hooks, Hotel Luxury Waterproof Decorative Shower Curtains for Bathroom - 72"x72" - Beige/Cream
short_description: 🛁【Linen Texture】- Made of 230GSM premium polyester fabric, which is wrinkle-resistant and non-fading. In addition, the weighted hem design can keep its shape and does not billow like lightweight shower curtains 🛁【Premium Quality】- Using advanced two-color yarn parallel weave, 2.6 times denser than the traditional weave. The high-density weave and heavy-duty polyester fabric provide maximum protection for your privacy. The simple and generous solid color style instantly enhances your bathroom taste and allows you to enjoy a luxurious hotel bath at home. 🛁【Standard Size】- W72’’×H72’’/(182cmx182cm). 12 rust-proof metal grommets (to prevent tears) that fit most standard shower hooks or rings. Package includes 1 Cream/Beige Shower Curtain and 12 Plastic Hooks(Convenient to install) 🛁【Water Resistant】- This waterproof fabric shower curtain can repel water and promote the formation of water droplets, causing water to roll off the surface quickly. It can effectively prevent moisture and water out of the bathroom. Support machine wash (Please machine washed in cold water with mild detergent and hangs to dry. Don't bleach or tumble dry) 🛁【Customer Satisfaction Assurance】 - We stand behind the quality of our shower curtains and are committed to resolving any product concerns you may experience. Thick Fabric & Enhanced Privacy - Made of upgraded faux linen fabric, thicker and denser than the traditional weave, not see through/semi sheer, no liner needed, provide maximum protection for your privacy.
